description: Getting the `inputType` property gets the type of the input.

description: Getting the `inputType` property gets the type of the input.

examples.title: Get a text box's input type

docs.summary: Gets an object containing information about the text box's styles.
description: The following styles can be used with text boxes:
+ [`backgroundColor`]($w.Style.html#backgroundColor)
+ [`borderColor`]($w.Style.html#borderColor)
+ [`borderRadius`]($w.Style.html#borderRadius)
+ [`borderWidth`]($w.Style.html#borderWidth)
+ [`color`]($w.Style.html#color)
Getting or setting a text box's styles, gets or sets the styles of the
text box's regular state. It does not set the styles of the text box's hover,
focus, error, or disabled states.

srcDocs.summary: Gets an object containing information about the text box's styles.
description: The following styles can be used with text boxes:
+ [`backgroundColor`]($w.Style.html#backgroundColor)
+ [`borderColor`]($w.Style.html#borderColor)
+ [`borderRadius`]($w.Style.html#borderRadius)
+ [`borderWidth`]($w.Style.html#borderWidth)
+ [`color`]($w.Style.html#color)
Getting or setting a text box's styles, gets or sets the styles of the
text box's regular state. It does not set the styles of the text box's hover,
focus, error, or disabled states.

docs.summary: Sets or gets a text input's value.
description: To reset the text box, restoring any placeholder text, set the value
property to null or undefined.

srcDocs.summary: Sets or gets a text input's value.
description: To reset the text box, restoring any placeholder text, set the value
property to null or undefined.

docs.summary: Determines if the text will contain line breaks when its value is read.
description: Setting the `wrap` property sets how the text box's contents
will be returned when its value is read. Setting `wrap` to `"hard"`
means line breaks are automatically inserted into the text. The width of
the text box determines where the line breaks are placed. Setting `wrap`
to `"soft"` means line breaks are not inserted when the value of the
text box is read.
Getting the `wrap` property gets how the text box's contents
will be returned when its value is read.

examples.title: Get wrapping of a text box
Set wrapping of a text box

description: Setting the `wrap` property sets how the text box's contents
